title: CAR MODEL VARIANT overview page
user_story:
As a visitor
I want to see a list of all CAR MODEL VARIANTS
So I can get a general idea of the different types that exist
And by scrolling through them find interesting ones
description:
* There is a dedicated page (with a dedicated URL) where all CAR MODEL VARIANTS are presented.
* A warning message is shown when there are no CAR MODEL VARIANTS.
* The overview page always returns with status code \`200\`, no matter if any CAR MODEL VARIANT exists or not.
* By default, the CAR MODEL VARIANTS are sorted \`ascending\` by their \`name\`.
* The sorting is always case-insensitive.
* Each CAR MODEL VARIANT is presented with its primary information and a link to its detail page.
* The overview displays at most 100 CAR MODEL VARIANTS at once.
* When there are more than 100 CAR MODEL VARIANTS then the \`pagination\` feature is activated.
* Pagination allows the user to scroll through all CAR MODEL VARIANTS - 100 items at a time.
* The user is able to bookmark and revisit any paginated CAR MODEL VARIANT page.
